text:
="preserve">Levels (stylized as Le7els) is a song by Swedish house producer and DJ Avicii. It was released as a single on 28 October 2011 on Interscope. The song was written by Avicii, Arash Pauroni, and Etta James.
"Levels" samples vocals from Etta James's "Something's Got a Hold on Me" (1962). It is the same sample previously used in Pretty Light's "Finally Moving". Primarily, the same sample was used by American rapper Flo Rida in his single "Good Feeling".

annotations.surface_form: Something's Got a Hold on Me
